Techs.Name: Pottery
Techs.Description: Allows your cities to construct a granary, which provides food.

Techs.Name: Animal Husbandry
Techs.Description: Reveals horses, and allows workers to build pastures, which improve various animal resources.

Techs.Name: Mining
Techs.Description: Allows workers to build mines, which grant access to several strategic and luxury resources and increases production. Also allows workers to clear forests.

Techs.Name: Sailing
Techs.Description: Allows access to sea resources by building work boats

Techs.Name: Calendar
Techs.Description: Allows your workers to build Plantations, which grant access to several luxury resources

Techs.Name: Writing
Techs.Description: Allows your cities to construct libraries, which increases science produced.  Also enables construction of the Great Library wonder.

Techs.Name: Trapping
Techs.Description: Allows your workers to build Camps and Trading Posts, which increase gold produced and grant access to several luxury resources

Techs.Name: The Wheel
Techs.Description: Allows construction or roads to your capilat city, providing gold from trade

Techs.Name: Masonry
Techs.Description: Allows workers to build quarries, granting access to stone and marble resources, and clear marshes. Also enables construction of the Pyramids wonder.

Techs.Name: Bronze Working
Techs.Description: Allows workers to remove jungles

Techs.Name: Optics
Techs.Description: Allows construction of lighthouses, providing more food for sea tiles

Techs.Name: Philosophy
Techs.Description: Allows construction of temples, which generate culture, and the Oracle and National College wonders

Techs.Name: Horseback Riding
Techs.Description: Allows construction of stables, which increase production on cattle, sheep and horses

Techs.Name: Mathematics
Techs.Description: Enables construction of the Hanging Gardens wonder.

Techs.Name: Construction
Techs.Description: Allows construction of colloseums, which generate happiness, and building lumber mills on forests, providing production

Techs.Name: Iron Working
Techs.Description: Reveals Iron on map

Techs.Name: Civil Service
Techs.Description: Enables the Chichen Itza wonder, which increases the length of golden ages

Techs.Name: Currency
Techs.Description: Enables construction of Markets and Mints, which increase gold. Also enables the Machu Pichu wonder.

Techs.Name: Engineering
Techs.Description: Enables construction of aqueducts, which speed up city growth

Techs.Name: Metal Casting
Techs.Description: Enables constrution of Forges and Workshops, increasing production

Techs.Name: Education
Techs.Description: Allows cities to convert production to science, construction of Universities which provide science, and construction of the Angkor Wat wonder

Techs.Name: Economics
Techs.Description: This is a lie, change!!!
